actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to include veterans participating in Operation Desert Storm and other veterans as eligible for veterans' mortgage bond financing.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit mortgage revenue bond financing of mortgages for veterans of combat activities in the Persian Gulf.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to include veterans participating in Operation Desert Storm and other veterans as eligible for veterans' mortgage bond financing.
